transcript:
Agent: Hello, thank you for considering our company. My name is John, and I'm calling about our new smart home security system.
Customer: Hi John, I've been looking into security systems. What makes yours stand out?
Agent: Our system offers real-time monitoring, motion detection, and alerts sent directly to your phone.
Customer: That sounds great. I've been having some issues with break-ins in my neighborhood.
Agent: I understand your concern. Our system has a 99% success rate in preventing burglaries.
Customer: That's impressive. What's the cost of the system and installation?
Agent: The system itself is $999, and installation is $200. However, we're running a promotion right now, and you can get 10% off.
Customer: Okay, that sounds reasonable. Do you offer any monthly monitoring fees?
Agent: Yes, our monitoring fee is $29.99 per month, but it's waived for the first three months.
Customer: Alright, I'm interested. Can you come out to my house to install it this week?
Agent: Let me check our schedule. (pause) Yes, we have an opening on Thursday or Friday.
Customer: Thursday works for me. What time?
Agent: How about 2 PM?
Customer: That's perfect. I'll see you then.
Agent: Great, we'll send you a confirmation email with all the details. Thank you for choosing our company.
Customer: Thank you, John. I'm looking forward to it.
Agent: You're welcome. Have a great day!
Customer: You too, bye.
Agent: Bye.
